name: Super Techno ninja (FINAL MOMENTS!)
blurb: Strider, and Castlevania meets Dishonored and Mark of the ninja, in this highly ambitious side scrolling action arcade game.

rewards.reward: Every pledge helps, your contribution to the creation of Super Techno Ninja is highly appreciated, the game wouldn't exist without you!

The super early bird! The first 50 backers to pledge this amount get a DRM free digital copy of the game Super Techno Ninja for PC. Your support, and help to get this project off the ground and up and running is greatly appreciated.

The early bird!  50 backers to pledge this amount get a DRM free digital copy of the game Super Techno Ninja for PC. Your support, and help to get this project off the ground and up and running is greatly appreciated.
If the projected is funded you'll receive a DRM free copy of the finished game Super Techno Ninja for PC. The game literally wouldn't exist without you!
As well as a DRM free copy of the game Super Techno Ninja for PC, your name will be added to a special credits page.
As well as a DRM free digital copy of the game Super Techno Ninja for PC, you'll also receive a digital copy (mp3 format) of the sound track from the game.

As well as a DRM free digital copy of the game Super Techno Ninja for PC, you'll also receive a digital copy (mp3 format) of the sound track from the game. Your name will be added to a special credits page.

As well as a DRM free digital copy of the game Super Techno Ninja for PC, you'll also receive a digital copy (mp3 format) of the sound track from the game, and some exclusive print quality (300dpi) digital artwork based on the game. Your name will be added to a special credits page.

You will receive a physical copy of the game on CD as well as a physical copy of the soundtrack on a audio CD in a printed sleeved DVD case and some exclusive print quality (300dpi) digital copy artwork based on the game. Your name will be added to a special credits page and on the case. POSTAGE INCLUDED IN PLEDGE AMOUNT

As well as a DRM free copy of the game Super Techno Ninja for PC, the sound track, and the art work listed in the above rewards, you get to name one the boss characters in the game, (subject to approval, and what that means is nothing inappropriate:) Your name will be added to a special credits page.

As well as a DRM free copy of the game Super Techno Ninja for PC, the sound track, and the art work listed in the above rewards, you get to name the final boss character in the game, (subject to approval, and what that means is nothing inappropriate:) Your name will be added to a special credits page.

A custom copy of the game for yourself. This means rename your copy of the game and rename all main characters. (only restriction is nothing offensive)  Also Get all the items of the \u00a3180 pledge Poster, digital artwork, Pendrive,Tshirt & Physical copy of game and soundtrack. (Any of the items where the title would usually be will have your own title) You will be named in your copy as one of the Executive Producers on the case and special credits page. POSTAGE INCLUDED IN PLEDGE AMOUNT

Rename the game! (subject to approval) The main Restrictions are as follows, cannot be more than 4 words in length, must relate to the theme (Ninja / Action) cannot be offensive and cannot have persons name in title, it cannot be plagirised and if the name sounds pants we will let you know! lol. Also Get all the items of the \u00a3180 pledge Poster, digital artwork, Pendrive,Tshirt & Physical copy of game and soundtrack. Dont forget name on case and special credits page. POSTAGE INCLUDED IN PLEDGE AMOUNT

You get the laptop PC the game Super Techno Ninja was developed on, fully loaded with everything that is currently on it, which includes software, games, numerous raw game assets, essentially an entire game development suite, as well as a bunch of random extras like movies and video games, (excluding personal files). As well as all of the rewards listed in the \u00a3180 pledge.
